summary: So I watched infinity war with my dad today (a man who has only ever seen hoco and black panther out of all the mcu films) so...
body:
So I watched infinity war with my dad today (a man who has only ever seen hoco and black panther out of all the mcu films) so I’m sharing some of the comments he made whilst we were watching:

- *sees Loki in the opening* “is that Thor?”

- “IDRIS ELBA?!”

- *laughs at literally everything tony says*

- *steve’s opening scene at the station* “who’s that? CAPTAIN AMERICA?” *muttering* “that doesn’t look like captain america”

- “Why are they giving the homeless guy an arm? What’s wrong with the one he has? HE DOESNT HAVE AN ARM?! What happened to you homeless man?”

- *gamora dies* “they’re not going to have enough characters for a sequel at this rate”

- *doctor strange hands over the time stone* “is it a fake? It’s probably a bomb”

- *everyone starts turning to dust* “NOT BLACK PANTHER! HE WAS THE ONLY GOOD ONE”

- *movie ends* “why would they do that?” *stares out of window*

summary: How Tony Stark Survives ‘Avengers: Endgame’ – Revealed?
title: How Tony Stark Survives ‘Avengers: Endgame’ – Revealed?
body:
OMG… Thoughts?

The new footage of Avengers: Endgame which debuted during the Super Bowl may reveal how Tony Stark will survive being stranded in space.

The first Endgame trailer shows Iron Man drifting helplessly, a day away from running out of oxygen. The situation looks pretty dire, but luckily Tony is not alone – the TV spot shows Nebula lending him a helping hand as the pair work on something together.…

summary: Avengers: Endgame -L'evoluzione nel tempo del quartier generale dei Vendicatori
title: Avengers: Endgame -L'evoluzione nel tempo del quartier generale dei Vendicatori
body:
Avengers: Endgame -L’evoluzione nel tempo del quartier generale dei Vendicatori

Da Avengers: Age of Ultron ad oggi, il quartier generale dei Vendicatori ha attraverso molte evoluzioni, l’ultima delle quali con Avengers: Endgame.

Grazie ad una nuova immagine dal set di Avengers: Endgame, siamo oggi in grado di poter apprezzare “quasi” nel dettaglio l’ultima evoluzione strutturale del celebre quartier generale degli Avengers. Ma come anticipato all’inizio di questo…

blog.name: mrdaps
blog.title: Mr. DAPs
blog.description:
Hi there!

I am Mr. DAPs, that guy with the hat that walks around Disneyland. I will mainly be posting some pictures that I have taken that I particularly like here but will occasionally post some other things.

You can read some of my other posts at any or all of the links below:

Blog: mrdaps.com
Website: dapsmagic.com
Twitter: twitter.com/mrdaps
Facebook: facebook.com/misterdaps

Please feel free to add me on any or all of the above links. I look forward to chatting with you and seeing you in the park!

Make it a GREAT day!

-Mr. DAPs

title: A Magical Nite - DISNEY Reporter
body:
A Magical Nite – DISNEY Reporter

Welcome to another edition of DISNEY Reporter. Each week the top Disney and geek headlines are shared. This week, there was a lot of ground to cover. From the Super Bowl to Disney Parks news, to other entertainment news, there were a lot of things going on from around the Walt Disney Company. Let’s take a look at this week’s headlines!

summary: Doctor Strange might’ve spent over 5,000 years peering through time to undo ‘Infinity War’ deaths
title: Doctor Strange might’ve spent over 5,000 years peering through time to undo ‘Infinity War’ deaths
body:
THIS IS A CRAZY NEW THEORY!!

No matter how heartbreaking the win over Thanos will be in Avengers: Endgame, one thing is certain: Doctor Strange is the architect of this win. I’m not just talking about the events in Infinity War that needed to happen in a certain way in order for the Avengers to actually beat the Titan in the next movie, but of other events from all the other Marvel movies, which may have been set up in a…

summary: Avengers: Endgame - Le locandine ispirate all'horror Noi
title: Avengers: Endgame - Le locandine ispirate all'horror Noi
body:
Avengers: Endgame – Le locandine ispirate all’horror Noi

Il 2019 sarà un anno interessante per quanto riguarda le uscite cinematografiche, e Avengers: Endgame e l’horror Noi sono sicuramente tra queste.

In questo nostro nuovo articolo vogliamo mostrarvi la grande idea avuta da un grafico, il quale ha scelto di fondere i due film … almeno graficamente. Utilizzando lo stile della locandina scelta nei giorni scorsi per l’horror Noi (qui l’articolo),…

blog.name: basched
blog.title: Keeper of the sacred words: NI, PENG and NOO WOM
blog.description:
A blog where I get to indulge in my favourite characters actors/actresses from various fandoms (mostly Marvel) and sometimes a few other things of interest. Thundershield and any pairing combinations of my fab four are greatly loved and desperately craved! 

 I also write stuff from time to time.

tags: I need my beloved to be all right!!
summary: If Thor dies in Endgame... the only way I’ll accept it is if this happens...
title: If Thor dies in Endgame... the only way I’ll accept it is if this happens...
body:
The end credit scene is of the surviving Asgardians in Norway, standing by his grave, releasing those glowing orbs. They then leave until there is no one around.  

No one except one small child. She is three or four years old, with long blonde hair. She holds a flower and places it on the grave. She whispers the words: 

“Goodbye, father.”

She eventually turns around and there is her mother. Who is the Lady Sif. 

They hug and Sif herself places a flower on Thor’s grave and they walk away together. 

THEN: The Sif series needs to happen. For my heart to mend,  I need the Sif series and I need her to be a kickass single mum to Thrud and help prepare her to be the Queen of Asgard. I want to see Sif telling Thrud about how great her father was, (with flashbacks or brief images of Thor).  I want Sif also to move on, to not be stuck in her grief. She needs to find new love with Beta Ray Bill and just be totally frickin’ awesome in bringing up her and Thor’s daughter.  

Just saying.  However, Thor’s not gonna die.  Steve’s not gonna die.  Tony’s not gonna die. None of them will and I’ll be happy knowing that the Big Three and all the original Avengers will be saving the universe as they always do, but just behind the scenes as it is. 

Okay, that last bit… someone is gonna die and I’m so scared.

summary: Star-Lord couldn’t have prevented the ‘Infinity War’ deaths, even if Chris Pratt thinks so
title: Star-Lord couldn’t have prevented the ‘Infinity War’ deaths, even if Chris Pratt thinks so
body:
Ummm, not sure if we believe you Chris Pratt… LOL

Thanos may be the person who snapped his fingers, killing half of all living beings in the known universe in Avengers: Infinity War, but it’s two guys who get most of the blame for it. One is a Guardian of the Galaxy, and the other is an old-school Avenger. Yes, I’m talking about Star-Lord and Thor, respectively. Both of them squandered their chances to prevent Thanos from fulfilling his mission.…

View On WordPress

summary: What will the runtime of Avengers Endgame be? Will it be longer than Infinity War? Avengers Endgame is without a doubt the...
caption:
What will the runtime of Avengers Endgame be? Will it be longer than Infinity War? Avengers Endgame is without a doubt the biggest movie coming out this year (save for maybe the next Star Wars) and because of that, everyone wants to know how long it’ll be to complete the story. Directors the Russo Brothers…

blog.name: neighbours-kid

alex. 23. they/them. nonbinary.

—

anthony edward stark has my heart forever

—

neighbourskid.com

summary: honestly, you know what i really want from endgame? i want tony to come back to earth and obviously steve and nat and bruce and...
body:
honestly, you know what i really want from endgame? i want tony to come back to earth and obviously steve and nat and bruce and rhodey and whoever else is there all ask what happened up there and he tells (probably mostly to rhodey) that peter is gone, and steve because he’s steve has the audacity to take the words “i am so sorry” in his mouth and you know what i want? i want him to fucking deck steve, fucking punch him in his stupid face so hard that his nose breaks because HOW DARE HE apologise NOW,,, steve who never apologised to tony for anything, not in ultron, not in civil war, who has shovelled all the burden of the earth onto tony’s shoulders through ignoring his knowledge, his insights, his fucking w i s d o m about what was about to happen, and now that tony faced all his demons up there in this desolate place, losing everything, guilt-ridden, already accepting death, after all that he returns to make sure this shit is fixed, to do everything in his power (like he has been doing since the very start, since he walked out of that hell hole in the desert) to fix the mistakes that have been made, and steve has the NERVE to try and apologise, tony just fucking loses it because if he had fucking listened, if any of them had fucking listened peter and the guardians and everyone would still be alive

and thor, precious thor, would take tony aside and truly, and heartfelt, and honestly tell tony how sorry he is for his loss, and he will be the only one who even remotely is allowed to do that because thor has lost everything and not through the snap. thor has lost his parents, his best friend, his brother, his people, he has no one left except the “””friends””” he made on earth, thor is the only one who can even remotely understand the pain and guilt tony feels

summary: Howard the duck has appeared in close proximity to the MCU guardians of the galaxy, partying or at least, in some way  drinking,...
body: Howard the duck has appeared in close proximity to the MCU guardians of the galaxy, partying or at least, in some way drinking, but did not appear in Infinity War. In the endgame trailer, Rocket is supposedly walking into a bar. In this essay I will prove Howard the Duck will play an essential role in the defeat of thanos–

reblog.comment: Howard the duck has appeared in close proximity to the MCU guardians of the galaxy, partying or at least, in some way drinking, but did not appear in Infinity War.
